Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards

Class ResourceCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.PlaceableCard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.PlayCard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.ResourceCard
public class ResourceCard extends PlayCard
This class represents the resource card

The resource card is one of the two playable card types. It is a card composed of the corners and a back resource.
It has no placement cost but it may have placement points.

By default when instantiated a card is facing downwards (displaying back)

  • Constructor Details

    • ResourceCard

      public ResourceCard()
      Default constructor: builds a "blank" card with all corners empty on both sides. Also doesn't initialize the resource and sets the points on placement to zero.

    • ResourceCard

      public ResourceCard(GameResource backResource, Corner... corners) throws InvalidParameterException
      Constructor for resource card with no points on place.
      Parameters:
      backResource - the resource displayed on the back of the card
      corners - the corners associated with the card
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException - when duplicate of corner fount

    • ResourceCard

      public ResourceCard(String cardID, GameResource backResource, Corner... corners) throws InvalidParameterException
      Constructs resource card with given identifier, specified resource on the back and corners. Default value of placement points is zero.
      Parameters:
      cardID - card unique identifier
      backResource - resource displayed on the back
      corners - contained corners
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException - when a duplicate corner is found

  • Method Details

    • getPlacementCost

      public Map<GameResource,Integer> getPlacementCost()
      Returns the map of counted resource needed to place the card.
      Since the resource cards don't have a placement cost it returns an empty map.
      Specified by:
      getPlacementCost in class PlayCard
      Returns:
      empty map

    • calculatePointsOnPlace

      Returns the points scored when placing this card.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      playArea - of the player who is currently making the action
      Returns:
      the points received from the placement

    • setPosition

      public PlaceableCard setPosition(GamePoint placement)
      Sets the position of the card.

      In order to make a card an immutable object, this method build a new identical card with the only new information of position.

      Specified by:
      setPosition in class PlaceableCard
      Parameters:
      placement - the position in which the card has to be placed
      Returns:
      an equal positioned card
